actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to recognize benefits to the United States from the construction of the Toledo Bend Dam and Reservoir project and exempt Sabine River Authority of Texas, from charges for the use, occupancy, and enjoyment of certain lands of the United States within the Sabine National Forest, Tex.

summary.text: Exempts the Sabine River Authority of Louisiana, and the Sabine River Authority of Texas from the payment of any annual charges imposed for the purpose of recompensing the United States for the use, occupancy, and enjoyment of its lands within the Sabine National Forest, Texas. Specifies that the use of such lands is necessary to the Authority for the construction and operation of the Toledo Bend Dam and Reservoir.

titles.title: A bill to recognize benefits to the United States from the construction of the Toledo Bend Dam and Reservoir project and exempt Sabine River Authority of Texas, from charges for the use, occupancy, and enjoyment of certain lands of the United States within the Sabine National Forest, Tex.
